ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Squeeze excess moisture from shredded potatoes to ensure crispiness
Use high heat and clarified butter to achieve a golden, crispy exterior
Resist the urge to stir frequently - allow potatoes to develop a crust
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the cook on achieving crispy, golden hash browns by managing heat and moisture properly, and resisting the temptation to overcook or over-stir.
